SVGAttributeG2.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The g2 attribute specifies a list of glyph names which identify a set of possible second glyphs in the kerning pair.

remarks.para: All glyphs with the given glyph name are included in the set. The total set of possible second glyphs in the kerning pair is the union of glyphs specified by the u2 and g2 attributes.
You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
